Content.Title: Plotting points and lines
Content.Text: Plotting 2D or 3D points or lines.

Content.Title: Plotting 2D lines
Plot 2D line style
Content.Text: Solid: default Dashes: '-' Long Dashes: '--' Dots: '.'

Content.Title: Plot 2D line colors
Content.Text: Color specified by a single character in quotes: 'r', 'o', 'y', 'g', 'b', 'k'

Content.Title: Plot 2D line thickness
Content.Text: either: 'Thickness', 1.5 'Width', 1.5

Content.Title: Plotting 2D points
Plot 2D point symbols
Content.Text: Star: '*' Plus: '+' x: 'x'

Content.Title: Plot 2D point colors
Content.Text: Color specified by a single character in quotes: 'r', 'o', 'y', 'g', 'b', 'k'

Content.Title: Plotting 3D lines
Plot 3D line symbols
Content.Text: Solid: default Dashes: '-' Long Dashes: '--' Dots: '.'

Content.Title: Plot 3D line colors
Content.Text: Color specified by a single character in quotes: 'r', 'o', 'y', 'g', 'b', 'k'

Content.Title: Plotting 3D points
Content.Text: plot (xCoordinates, yCoordinates, zCoordinates, options); xCoordinates - single number or a vector of x coords yCoordinates - single number or a vector of y coords zCoordinates - single number or a vector of z coords options - specify the color, size and type of symbol

Content.Title: Plot 3D point symbols
Content.Text: Star: '*' (draws a sphere)

Content.Title: Plot 3D point colors
Content.Text: Color specified by a single character in quotes: 'r', 'o', 'y', 'g', 'b', 'k'

Content.Title: Camera Position and Orientation for 3D plots
Content.Text: Specify camera poition and point it is looking at in 3D cartesian coordinates

Content.Title: Camera Absolute Position
Content.Text: CameraAbsPos (x, y, z); CameraAbsPos (pos); % pos is a 3 element vector

Content.Title: Camera Relative Position
Camera Center
Content.Text: The point in 3D space the camera rotates around and zooms towards or away from CameraCenter (x, y, z); CameraCenter (pos); % pos is a 3 element vector PlotCenter (pos) % another name for this function
